titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of October 2024 as "National Co-Op Month" and commending the cooperative business model and the member-owners, businesses, employees, farmers, ranchers, and practitioners who use the cooperative business model to positively impact the economy and society.

A resolution expressing support for the designation of October 2024 as "National Co-Op Month" and commending the cooperative business model and the member-owners, businesses, employees, farmers, ranchers, and practitioners who use the cooperative business model to positively impact the economy and society.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
